website_summaries.verdict: The fourth iteration in the Under Armour Street Encounter collection is the perfect sneaker and sandal hybrid. It has a flexible and supportive canvas upper. At the same time, its stretchy lacing facilitates easy slipping on and off for the ultimate convenience, just like a sandal.Lightweight and comfortable, the low-top shoe has a minimal and clean-cut look. With its budget-friendly price, the sneaker is ideal for those looking for a low-profile casual and relaxed footwear.
pros: There are diverse color options to choose from
The Under Armour Street Encounter IV is very comfortable, most testers have praised
Many wearers admire the sneaker’s style, which they describe as trendy and clean-cut
Some users comment that these are good lightweight shoes from the Under Armour sneaker series
Several purchasers like the convenience of the UA Street Encounter IV’s slip-on design
A couple of buyers like the kicks so much that they want to buy another pair in a different color
The Street Encounter IV from Under Armour is a budget-friendly footwear option
A couple of testers have received a lot of compliments when they wear the shoe
cons: This shoe doesn't have much arch support, some testers have discovered
The Street Encounter IV’s insole keeps on moving around, at least one user has complained
A couple of wearers note that the Under Armour Street Encounter IV fits a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them!! They are so handsome on him!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband. I love the style. they can go with athletic apparel, casual, beachy, or dressy. They are very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ok... I know it says "Heeled Sandal" in the product title, but I didn't know what that meant. So, I admit this was my fault. I really liked the look of the shoe, so I bought a pair. When pulling one out the box, it was sooooooo light. Too light. Then, I looked and saw the shoe doesn't have rubber tread on the bottom, just foam all the way... like a pair of flip-flops. So, I guess that's why it's a "Sandal". I was definitely looking for a pair of shoes; these are not shoes... so I'm returning them. With that being said... these fit well and are comfortable. But, they are over-priced for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes only took a star because they are i lttle narrow, maybe my feet but it would be perfect if they were a little wider. super lite weight, comfortable, runs half size small but i ordered with that in mind (being a big AU fan and terp). one surprise was the aqua trim on the inside but not a factor for me. also love the slide in laces for on the go. love the design and cloth material. great price. might buy another color
customer_reviews.author: Belteshazzar

customer_reviews.title: Got to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Basically the only shoe my son will wear now. Got him 3 different pairs to take to school with him. These are his go to shoe with the exception of doing drills and PT, but he said he could use these in a pinch. I will be ordering a second pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: A very nice quality shoe at an affordable price. Made well, and easy to slip on and off!
customer_reviews.author: fifirav47

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my son’s 2nd pair of these sneakers. He preferred the first pair which was two-toned, navy and khaki, but they don’t make those anymore. But he still loves them to wear as a casual tennis shoe. Not meant for an all-day-walking tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bungee laces for easy slip on and off means the shoe slips and almost falls off. Overall quality seems like a much cheaper shoe. I have 4 pair of Under Armour shoes all high build quality, style, and very comfortable fit. Returned these shoes immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I got these as an early bday present for my bf and he loves them. They're super comfortable and lightweight. They look great and are perfect for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: The Four Mutts Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Ultra light and ultra comfortable BUT...
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic shoe!! Super light and WAY COMFORTABLE. The only thing I didn’t like was that the toes send to dent in. 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: newmexicosaint

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves them... it was an anniversary gift and he was so shocked!! Love this.. might buy more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Another Good From That Under Armour brand
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and easy off, great slip ons without having that ”Slip On” look. Looks great for that casual dress up look.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to his closet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, he absolutely loves them. Had the exact style and comfort expected from his other under armor shoes. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nowling

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for any day
customer_reviews.text: easy on easy off, nice padding on the soul fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Googleuser

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we have purchased because my husband loved his first pair so much that he wore them out after about a year of semi-daily use. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Slip on is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: They are really comfortable and I love the slip-on feature that is a huge huge plus! I love UA!
customer_reviews.author: K.c.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: These are light and comfy. No laces to be tied. Loos good with shorts, jeans, or slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Byham

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes very light!! I wear these every day on hot ash fault and they last about 5 months. This is my second pair and don’t plan to buy any other shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if size is in stock and color. Wish UA would stock more sixes and colors and these shoes are very comfortable, stylish, and easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Allen G.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My son love them. At first he wanted Vans. But we found these UA ones that look like vans and are cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C.

customer_reviews.title: Like what I get
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable and very lightweight Will see if it last
customer_reviews.author: Jaime varela

customer_reviews.title: love these slip ons!
customer_reviews.text: repeat purchase , love these shoes. Tread seems to wear out fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: hokieshark

customer_reviews.title: It is the most conformable shoes I have ever own.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the box I thought the box was empty. That is how light they are. It is ridiculous how comfortable those shoes are. I just love it. I will buy a khaki ones but they were out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Asdrubal Bordelois Ontime Improvement

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I like this sneakers very easy to wear . Don’t have to worry tying your shoes laces. This sneakers is very light weight. Not heavy
customer_reviews.author: Titou Kim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with these shoes very comfortable he said
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sassone

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This is for narrow feet only, like really narrow! Ouch! Was so tight and painful when I put them on.. otherwise, it looked nice and the durability seems good. So was disappointed on how tight it was. Oh well, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: David Koval

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This a good shoe. It can be worn on many occasions and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit , great look
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for casual wear. Light weight and feels great . Stylish
customer_reviews.author: Jay Croteau

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. I bought 3 pairs of different colors I like them so much. No laces -- easy to get on and off -- and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style! This is a very lightweight casual summer shoe perfect for kicking back with your feet up or out taking a stroll. I was amazed with the comfort and breathability of this shoe. Just bought a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: MARK M.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Street Encounter Iv Heeled Sandal
product_meta.description: Stretch canvas upper provides the ultimate fit & complete comfort. Stretch bungee lacing system provides ease of entry, built to quickly slip the shoe on & off. Upgraded PU sockliner for superior cushioning & comfort. EVA outsole offers improved mobility, lightweight cushioning & increased traction.
feature_bullets: Stretch canvas upper provides the ultimate fit & complete comfort
Stretch bungee lacing system provides ease of entry, built to quickly slip the shoe on & off
Upgraded PU sockliner for superior cushioning & comfort
EVA outsole offers improved mobility, lightweight cushioning & increased traction
